subject: newbie question
msgSnippet: Hello, I m looking into JUnit to test a new email component I wrote. I read through the Money example and it makes sense but what I m trying to test is a
messageBody:
Hello,

I'm looking into JUnit to test a new email component I wrote. I read through
the Money example and it makes sense but what I'm trying to test is a little
different.

I have a class which is responsible for deciding which email template to use
based on some complex business rules. The selected template is never stored
in the class itself (this is a singleton object). Instead, it's passed to
another method in another class which populates the template with dynamic
data and sends the email out.

Any ideas on how JUnit could be useful to make sure that the correct
templates are always selected and that the emails are actually sent?

Thanks.
--Chris
